title: Towel, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk and metal-wrapped silk on cotton (warp) and silk (weft) ground
Technique: counted and uncounted stitches; running, stem, satin and double running stitches on plain weave
description: Towel with a wide border at each end. The border has three repeats of a five inch plant in shades of pink, blue and metallic silver. There is a five inch fringe at each end made from the warp.

tombstone.epitaph:
Towel, 19th century. Medium: silk and metal-wrapped silk on cotton (warp) and silk (weft) ground
Technique: counted and uncounted stitches; running, stem, satin and double running stitches on plain weave. 1974-92-2.
